Package it.polimi.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.model.Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Map of the game, contain an ArrayList of type Square, that represent the gameboard.

      • distance

        public int distance​(int rInit,
                    int cInit,
                    int rDest,
                    int cDest,
                    int dist)
        Calculate the minimum distance from A(rInit,cInit) to B(rDest,cDest).
        Parameters:
        rInit - row of current square
        cInit - column of current square
        rDest - row of search sqaure
        cDest - column of search square
        dist - the distance at the iteration
        Returns:
        minimum distance from A(rInit,cInit) to B(rDest,cDest)
